titleStmt.title: A remedie against dissention, or, A help to settle mens mindes in these unsetled times, and to make up the rents made, and likely to be made through the late lamentable increase of opinions and practices as it was delivered in a sermon of Rom. 16,17 / by I.R. ...
titleStmt.author: I. R., Minister of the Gospell.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Iohn Stafford and are to be sold at his shop ...,
